doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 37 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 154[Air Date: 6/10/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 37 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 154[Air Date: 6/10/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Los Angeles Domestic Partners Bill2. The American Civil Liberty's Union anti-discrimination project3. Boston demonstrators protest against anti-gay foster parent legislation4. Andy Hum on Father's DayCOMMERCIAL: Brunch Buddies5. Harvard researchers announce they have blood test for AIDS which can also detect the virus in carriers, eliminates false positives6. Bathhouses promote safe-sex in conference, interview with Mike Fesco, Atlanta Manager of Club BathsCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp7. Booksellers ban8. Texas students throw beer cans at gay pride float8. Tom Cuite resignsCOMMERCIAL: Chamberlain and Associates, career service professionals9. Sports, "we are the world" clipCOMMERCIAL: "The Connection," gay and lesbian newspaper10. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with Dr. Dan William, board member of New York Physicians for Human Rights, discusses antiviral agents and Isoprinosine11. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Media report/current events/culture, includes clipsCOMMERCIAL: "Manscape," a gay magazine2. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Brunch Buddies3. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Carnaval in Rio de Janeiro, Islanders' Club4. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Arco Blancos resort, San Juan, Puerto Rico5. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 37 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 154[Air Date: 6/10/1985]: June 1985
